sourcesContent:
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './ItemCard.css' import { useState } from 'react' export const ItemCard = ( { category, id, thumbnail, title, brand, price, rating } ) =>{ const [productsIDs, setProductsIDs] = useState({ category: '', id: "", thumbnail: "", title: "", brand: "", price: "", rating: "", }) console.log(productsIDs) const handleSubmitCart = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() const guardarLocalStorage = (id) => localStorage.setItem(`produtosCarrinho`, JSON.stringify(id)) const pegarLocalStorage = () => JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('produtosCarrinho')) ?? [] const dbCLient = pegarLocalStorage() setProductsIDs dbCLient.push(id, category) guardarLocalStorage(dbCLient) /* if(dbCLient[id] === id){ console.log('Esse número já existe') //document.getElementById('btn-addFav').disabled = true dbCLient.pop(id) } */ } const handleSubmitFav = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() const guardarLocalStorage = (id) => localStorage.setItem(`produtosFavoritados`, JSON.stringify(id)) const pegarLocalStorage = () => JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('produtosFavoritados')) ?? [] const dbCLient = pegarLocalStorage() dbCLient.push(id) guardarLocalStorage(dbCLient) } return(

{category}

{title}

{brand}

R$: {price},00

Avaliação: {rating}

) }
